action_title: Other biodiversity: Use organic fertilizer instead of inorganic

Plants (1 study): One replicated, randomized, controlled study from ItalyÂ found more plants and plant biomass, but similar numbers of plant species, in plots with organic fertilizer, compared to plots with inorganic fertilizer.
